title: Textile, 1973-51-132, ca. 1780
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave foundation.  2 reds block-printed.  Yellow and blue applied by brush.
dimensions:
Warp x Weft: 60 x 17.5 cm (23 5/8 x 6 7/8 in.)
Repeat (straight): 12.1 x 6.4 cm (4 3/4 x 2 1/2 in.)
Printing block: 24.1 cm (9 1/2 in.)
description: Small flowers within a diamond grid of reserved spaces on a red picottage background.

exhibitions.title: Color by the Yard: Printed Fabrics from 1760-1860
